title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 363.2 - Day of disability for computing waiting period
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 363.2 - Day of disability for computing waiting period

State Regulations

In computing the waiting period for benefits, any day on
which an employee was prevented from performing work because of disability and
for which he has not received his regular remuneration, shall be deemed a day
of disability, even though the employee was not scheduled to work on that
day. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
363.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
